list.abs: because the minister also afriend of M. Walter , it was not difficult for de Cantel's new paramour to learn the state secret that France would soon guarantee the Moroccan debt .因为部长也是华代尔先生的密友，所以德·坎特尔的新情人不费什么周折便了解到一项国家机密：法国不久将承诺担保摩洛哥的债务。
your judgment has been clouded by the sunk-cost fallacy : you hoped to get a master' s degree , great food and an italian paramour .沉没成本谬论影响了你的判断：你希望得到一个硕士学位、美食和一位意大利情人。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French par amour 'by love'; in English the phrase was written from an early date as one word and came to be treated as a noun

means.word_mean: 2. a woman who cohabits with an important man
